Title: Zarges 100302 Hop-Up Work Platform 600 x 300mm ZAR100302
Description:
This Zarges Hop-Up Work Platform has the following specification:

Platform Length: 600mm.
Platform Width: 300mm.
Coating: Natural.
Load Capacity: 150kg.
Material: Aluminium.
Platform Height: 0.47m.
Working Height: 2.47m.
Warranty: 10 Years.

The Zarges Hop-Up Work Platform offers a convenient and safe way to reach low level heights, ideal for decorating or low level maintenance tasks. It has a has a large platformfor safe and comfortable working. Fitted with slip-resistant plastic end caps for increased stability. Folds to extremely small dimensions for transport and storage.
